{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:10.819
    | text      = unarmed group of people and meet with all of the species on Mars and the two alien races,
}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:31.500

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:56.759

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

    | timestamp = 00:35:03.219
    | text      = Not...

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:04.219
    | text      = Yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:05.219
    | text      = He means there's three.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:06.219
    | text      = Yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:07.219
    | text      = Yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:08.219
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:09.219
    | text      = And we'll get to those in a little bit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:10.219
    | text      = That's a tease of things to come.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:11.219
    | text      = He does not explain that in the time being.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:13.460

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
